patch 8.2.1770: invalid memory use when using SpellFileMissing autocmd

Problem:    Invalid memory use when using SpellFileMissing autocmd.
Solution:   Add test case. (Dominique Pellé, closes #7036)  Fix using a window
            that was closed.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.1770: invalid memory use when using SpellFileMissing autocmd · vim/vim@d569a9e
attachments.text: Problem: Invalid memory use when using SpellFileMissing autocmd. Solution: Add test case. (Dominique Pellé, closes #7036) Fix using a window that was closed.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/4934ad0e448bfa03ba19c7c5b411c457a9910442|patch 8.2.1769: popup filter interferes with using :normal to move th…>
patch 8.2.1769: popup filter interferes with using :normal to move the cursor

Problem:    A popup filter interferes with using :normal to move the cursor in
            a popup.
Solution:   Do not invoke the filter when ex_normal_busy is set.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1769: popup filter interferes with using :normal to move th… · vim/vim@4934ad0
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1769: popup filter interferes with using :normal to move th… · vim/vim@4934ad0
attachments.text: …e cursor Problem: A popup filter interferes with using :normal to move the cursor in a popup. Solution: Do not invoke the filter when ex_normal_busy is set.

attachments.title: Update runtime files. · vim/vim@d58a3bf

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b45cd36bd90f71e4a35b1ef1f75a3bedef6d8bac|patch 8.2.1768: cannot use the help menu from a terminal window>
patch 8.2.1768: cannot use the help menu from a terminal window

Problem:    Cannot use the help menu from a terminal window.
Solution:   Add ":tlnoremenu" commands. (Yee Cheng Chin, closes #7023)
